name: Mexican Talavera
prompt: A VibeDeck controller decorated in Mexican Talavera pottery style. Hand-painted bright flowers, birds, and vines on white ceramic background. Cobalt blue, sunny yellow, terracotta orange, and grass green colors. Folk art patterns covering every surface. The buttons are small Talavera tiles. The rotary knob has a sunflower painted on it. Artisan hand-crafted imperfections. Cheerful, rustic, traditional Mexican folk art. Warm sunny lighting.
why: Folk art beauty, handmade aesthetic, warm colors
